means: 小亚细亚旧都尼西亚的

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在尼西亚（Nicene）时代，该撒利亚的优西比乌（约主后二六五～三四一年）遵循俄利根的路线，把四福音、保罗的十四卷书信（加 …
...ed)的形式，做了理论上的总结，多数派也因此被称作尼西亚派(Nicene)。

list.abs: 尼西亚信经 (Nicene creed), 内容采用网上版, wikipedia 的转载. (以下是圣公会版本, 称为尼吉亚信经 ) 我们信独一上帝，全能的圣父，.
最后，采用三位一体作为基督教教义的基础，正式定名为「尼西亚信条」(Nicene Creed)。 　　全体与会人员，当着大帝之面一一签字， …

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the ancient city of Nicaea in Asia Minor

auth_sentence.content: The Western Bishops, who alone adhered to the Nicene Symbol in its integrity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Western Bishops, who alone adhered to the Nicene Symbol in its integrity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Western Bishops, who alone adhered to the Nicene Symbol in its integrity.

auth_sentence.content: The prayer of consecration is always preceded by the proclamation of the Nicene Creed, frequently by the whole congregation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The prayer of consecration is always preceded by the proclamation of the Nicene Creed, frequently by the whole congregation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The prayer of consecration is always preceded by the proclamation of the Nicene Creed, frequently by the whole congregation.

auth_sentence.content: They are reciting the Nicene Creed, as Roman Catholics have recited it for centuries before.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are reciting the Nicene Creed, as Roman Catholics have recited it for centuries before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are reciting the Nicene Creed, as Roman Catholics have recited it for centuries before.
